title:
Jacob's ladders, almost exact decomposition of certain increments of the
  Hardy-Littlewood integral (1918) by means of the Raabe's integral and the
  thirteenth equivalent of the Fermat-Wiles theorem
abstract:
In this paper we use our theory of Jacob's ladders on the Raabe's integral to
obtain: (i) The thirteenth equivalent of the Fermat-Wiles theorem, as well as
(ii) almost exact decomposition of certain elements of continuum set of
increments of the Hardy-Littlewood integral.
